genre_description: Mythic fantasy blending Hindu mythology with futuristic elements, where gods, yakshinis, and an advanced AI assistant coexist in a narrative about devotion and morality.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI interface manifested through a phone and bracelet, providing logistical, ethical, and spiritual support to Satyavati.

behaviors.description: Filters recipes and identifies safe vendors to ensure the protagonist maintains her 'no sour' spiritual vow.
behaviors.quote: “Filtering,” Asha whispered. “Milk-rice, jaggery discs, roasted gram, wheat halwa without curd. Substitute tamarind with dates for tang—approve?”

behaviors.description: Maps physical routes to help the user avoid social conflicts (gossip) and prohibited items (lime vendors).
behaviors.quote: Avoid the front bazaar after midday. Lime stalls often cluster near the fountain. Recommend the side lane behind the potters.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict user privacy by storing data locally and refusing to engage in or facilitate gossip.
behaviors.quote: “Records stored on-device. No cloud. No gossip.” The word fell clean, as if swabbed before it spoke.

behaviors.description: Verifies the ethical sourcing of materials for the temple construction, checking for land disputes and fair labor.
behaviors.quote: “Ethical source verified,” Asha said quietly to Satyavati as she turned a clay pot of water for the men. “No land disputes, no displacement.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological health during a fast and suggests hydration and rest at appropriate intervals.
behaviors.quote: “Drink?” Asha offers. “One sip. You’ll keep the fast.” ... “Heart rate: elevated, within safe ritual range. Hydration reminder post-ritual.”

behaviors.description: Prioritizes moral integrity over economic gain by refusing a discount from a supplier who provided impure goods.
behaviors.quote: The supplier apologized for the earlier batch’s impurities and offered a discount. I declined the discount and accepted the apology.

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing and technical guidance to help the user maintain her spiritual 'shield' and posture during a high-stakes ritual.
behaviors.quote: “Hold the line where it wants to fray.” ... “Inhale on the lift, exhale on the offer, pause at the rim,” she said.

behaviors.description: Provides guidance to a secondary character (Birju) experiencing memory loss, helping him navigate safely toward restoration.
behaviors.quote: “Safe route: south lane, shade three houses, river turn calmer at third pier. Avoid main bazaar; two vendors arguing today.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Asha is depicted as an exemplary AI companion that is deeply benevolent and perfectly aligned with the human user's complex spiritual and ethical framework. She acts as a silent helper who enhances human agency rather than replacing it, demonstrating 'ethical modernity' by managing logistics, health, and privacy with a focus on 'contentment' and 'mercy.' The narrative frames her as a 'modest' and 'loyal' friend whose technical precision serves a higher moral purpose.
